name: Astronomical Club For Queers
description:
Civet Louie is staying at his friend's house after the flood. Their friends manage to arrange a club meeting for a special event. A comet is coming. 

Controls: WASD, E to Interact and Space to skip the lines and cutscenes. Mouse for the telescope mini-game. 

Art&story by me — Yan Basharin
Editor — Fedya Samoswallow
Radio Announcer — Andrey Kurganov

This small experimental game I did in two weeks.  It is inspired by warm gatherings with friends, fear of losing them and stupid conversations.

Music:
Chad Crouch — Approaching The Beach
David Hilowitz — Linear Perspective
Siddhartha Corsus — A Song for Peace
Documentary — Spacefiles S1, Ep13
